cause.description:
Hearts in Action International's main focus is ministering to children.
They run a school in the Petén Jungle, where the kids receive not only an education, but also food, clothing, basic healthcare, and love. HIA also works with the public school system to teach basic virtues to students.
Visiting missionaries can accompany them on trips to orphanages, hospitals, and public squares. They also reach out to men and women in prison, rehab centers, dumps, and local villages.
http://heartsinaction.org
1. Jesus Christ transforms lives
2. Every child has the right to basic necessities and education
cause.mission: share the love of God with the children of Guatemala and Peru
